content.description: The following question is based on the excerpt below.
content.question: At the end of the example, which chord is tonicized using a secondary dominant?

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in notated music.
